title: Cardno awards inaugural Ian Porter Educational Assistance Award in the Philippines (Cardno Limited)
text: ( Source : Cardno Limited ) â€‹Cardno is thrilled to announce the first recipient of Ian Porter Educational Assistance Award , Erwin Miguel Pangilinan. The Award was presented to Erwin by Ian Porter himself and James R. Young , Cardno Philippines
